name: sra_fastq_importer
title: SRA FASTQ Importer
summary: Download SE or PE reads in FASTQ or FASTA format from SRA using SRR accessions

inputSpec.name: output_type
inputSpec.label: Output Type
inputSpec.help: Whether to output FASTQ or FASTA files.

inputSpec.name: validate
inputSpec.label: Prefetch and validate
inputSpec.help: Run prefetch and vdb-validate before fastq dump.

inputSpec.name: split_files
inputSpec.label: Split reads?
inputSpec.help: Dump each read into separate file. Files will receive suffix corresponding to read number.

inputSpec.name: read_ids
inputSpec.label: Append Read IDs?
inputSpec.help: Append read id after spot id as 'accession.spot.readid' on defline.

inputSpec.name: dumpbase
inputSpec.label: Use base space?
inputSpec.help: Format sequences using base space (for all applications other than SOLiD.)

inputSpec.name: skip_technical
inputSpec.label: Skip Technical Reads?
inputSpec.help: Dump only biological reads, no technical reads.

inputSpec.name: advanced
inputSpec.label: Extra command line options for fastq-dump
inputSpec.help: Extra arguments for fastq-dump, e.g. -X 10000 to retrieve max. 10000 fastq records

outputSpec.name: reads_fastq
outputSpec.label: Reads
outputSpec.help: Output fastq files, gzipped unless changed in advanced options.

outputSpec.name: reads2_fastq
outputSpec.label: Reads (Right Mates)
outputSpec.help: Output fastq files, gzipped unless changed in advanced options.

details.whatsNew: * 1.0.0: Initial release using SRA toolkit version 2.8.0
